column4: can someone tell me the name of a half decent code editor program? I would use the text editor but it doesnt have line numbers and i have been using 'scream' but I don't like it, it randomly closes itself
is there kind of like a standard one that the majority of people use in ubuntu?
yea thats what I need really, cos thats what I am doing in it
check out the plugins in Gedit, you can enable syntax highlighting and line numbering

and google for third party syntax highlighters for various languages

gedit uses GtkSourceView for syntax highlighting, you just need to find/write XML files for the languages you want, details are in the first article
